jp_text: 醒(めざめ)の墓標 目指す
google_translated: Aim for the grave of awake

en_text:
Mogaki Wakare Yamiyo no yume
The life, the death,
the dream of darkness
jp_text: 生(もがき) 死(わかれ) 闇夜の夢
google_translated: Raw  Death  Darkness of the dark night

en_text:
Wakiagaru kibou utae
Sing for the hope
that gushes forth
jp_text: 湧きあがる希望 歌え！

en_text: All that is alive, everything...
jp_text: 生きているモノ 全てのモノ

en_text:
When you see the
end of evolution...
jp_text: 進化の終わりが見えた時
google_translated: When the end of evolution is seen

en_text:
...the spirals of our future
will collapse one by one.
jp_text: 未来のらせんが

en_text: Your genes shall then be...
jp_text: あなたの遺伝子

en_text: Next Episode... Death
jp_text: 捩じ切れる
